headline: A Look At Aon (AON) Valuation After CEO Contract Extension And Long Term Incentive Award
summary: Aon (AON) has put leadership continuity front and center, extending CEO Greg Case’s employment agreement to December 2030, increasing his base salary and tying a large performance share grant to multi-year operational targets. See our latest analysis for Aon. At a share price of $349.92, Aon’s recent 30 day share price return of 1.90% and year to date share price return of 1.64% sit alongside a 5 year total shareholder return of 75.94%. This suggests longer term holders have seen stronger...
